name: Hora Bruja
overview:
You play a witch who has been trapped in her castle for over a century. A new witch has taken your powers and wants to reign in the kingdom. Although annoying, you decide to go beat him.

Hora bruja is an open world game whose style and behavior are reminiscent of the excellent CAULDRON. You must complete various missions consisting of classic collection of items. The level design and simple but pleasant graphics are reminiscent of JET SET WILLY and it is fun to navigate the vast map of the game.

But it is also difficult because it will be necessary to go back many times in the same places, which is tedious because many passages are very difficult.
